paths.description: The Path of the Ring: Choose this path if you decide to secretly wear the One Ring and let its influence affect your decisions.
paths.start: Frodo Baggins, a humble hobbit living in the serene Shire, discovers that he is the bearer of the One Ring, a powerful artifact sought by the Dark Lord Sauron. Feeling the weight of responsibility, Frodo sets out on a perilous journey to Mount Doom, the only place where the Ring can be destroyed.

paths.description: The Path of Fellowship: Frodo Baggins, accompanied by his loyal friend Samwise Gamgee and guided by the wisdom of Gandalf the Grey, embarks on a quest to destroy the One Ring. Along the way, they join forces with a diverse fellowship consisting of elves, dwarves, men, and other creatures of Middle-earth.
paths.start: Frodo Baggins, accompanied by his loyal friend Samwise Gamgee and guided by the wisdom of Gandalf the Grey, embarks on a quest to destroy the One Ring. Along the way, they join forces with a diverse fellowship consisting of elves, dwarves, men, and other creatures of Middle-earth.

questions.question: As you set out from the Auenland, the One Ring whispers in your mind: 'Reveal your secret to Samwise and claim his loyalty.' What do you do?
options: a. Ignore the Ring's suggestion and remain silent about the Ring.
b. Reveal your secret to Samwise.

questions.question: While crossing the Dead Marshes, you feel a strong desire to keep moving despite warning signs. The Ring says: 'Ignore the warnings and continue on.' What do you decide?
options: a. Heed the warnings and turn back.
b. Obey the Ring's command and press forward.

questions.question: In Lothlorien, Galadriel offers the Ring to be destroyed in her flame. The Ring urges: 'Refuse Galadriel's offer and seize her power instead.' What do you choose?
options: a. Decline Galadriel's offer and attempt to gain her strength.
b. Accept her generosity and allow her to destroy the Ring.

questions.question: As you journey through the Moria Mine, the Ring demands: 'Take the Mithril to enrich yourself instead of sharing it with the Dwarves.' What do you decide?
options: a. Refrain from taking the Mithril and respect the Dwarves' possessions.
b. Disregard your companions' feelings and keep the valuable metal for yourself.

questions.question: In the Chamber of Mazarbul, you must choose a path to safety. The Ring tells you: 'Lead your companions into danger by choosing the left passage.' What do you choose?
options: a. Ignore the Ring's suggestion and take the right passage.
b. Follow the Ring's guidance and go down the left passage.

questions.question: On Weathermere, you are approached by the Mouth of Sauron, who offers to spare your life if you hand over the Ring. The Ring whispers: 'Accept his offer and betray your friends.' What do you do?
options: a. Reject the Mouth's proposal and remain loyal to your fellowship.
b. Abandon your companions and take the easy way out by surrendering the Ring.

questions.question: In Moria, the Ring urges: 'Confront the Balrog alone and prove your greatness.' What do you decide?
options: a. Defy the Ring's command and stay with your companions.
b. Obey the Ring's guidance and face the Balrog by yourself.

questions.question: As you near Mount Doom, the Ring pleads: 'Cast it from the peak and claim your power.' What do you choose to do?
options: a. Defy the Ring's command and carry it safely to Destroyer.
b. Give in to the Ring's influence and attempt to wield its power.

questions.question: As you set out from the Auenland, Samwise advises: 'Remain open about your burden and rely on our companionship.' You decide to:
options: a. Listen to Samwise and be honest with your fellowship.
b. Keep the Ring a secret and ignore Samwise's counsel.

questions.question: In Lothlorien, Galadriel presents you with the choice to destroy the Ring in her flame. What do you choose?
options: a. Accept her offer and destroy the Ring.
b. Decline her offer and continue the journey.

questions.question: In Moria, you find Mithril. What do you choose to do?
options: a. Share the Mithril with the Dwarves, valuing their friendship over personal gain.
b. Keep the Mithril for yourself.

questions.question: In the Chamber of Mazarbul, you must choose a path. What do you choose?
options: a. Lead your companions down the right passage to safety.
b. Lead your companions down the left passage into danger.

questions.question: On Weathermere, the Mouth of Sauron offers to spare your life if you hand over the Ring. What do you do?
options: a. Reject the offer and remain loyal to your fellowship.
b. Accept the offer and betray your fellowship.

questions.question: In Moria, you encounter a Balrog. What do you choose to do?
options: a. Face the Balrog alongside your companions.
b. Confront the Balrog alone.

questions.question: When confronting the Balrog, what do you choose to do?
options: a. Stay with your fellowship, refusing to give in to the Ring's influence.
b. Give in to the Ring's influence and attempt to confront the Balrog alone.

questions.question: As you near Mount Doom, what do you choose to do?
options: a. Resist the Ring's temptation and carry it safely to Destroyer.
b. Give in to the Ring's influence and attempt to claim its power.
